package.name: autoware_auto_msgs
package.description:
The autoware_auto_msgs package is a partial port of the eponymous package from ROS2 [1].
This package is a follow up from 'plan_msgs', which also contained only Trajectory message. However, as time for the trajectory points was missing, a decision was made to use some 'more standardized' trajectory description.
[1]: https://index.ros.org/r/autoware_auto_msgs/
package.author: Jaroslav Klap√°lek
